title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.112 - Denials and appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.112 - Denials and appeals

State Regulations
(a) Denial of access to records shall be in writing stating the reason therefor and
advising the requester of the right to appeal to the individual established to
determine appeals, who shall be identified by name, title, business address and
business phone number. (b) Appeals
may be taken in accordance with section
89
of the

Public Officers Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.112

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
